mapper.select:
-- retrieveTssItgRdcsList select ir.AFFR_CD as affrCd ,ir.APRDOCSTATE as aprdocstate --결재상태코드 ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('APRDOCSTATE',ir.APRDOCSTATE) as aprdocstateNm --결재상태코드 ,ir.APPROVAL_USERID as approvalUserid --결재 요청자 ID ,ir.APPROVAL_USERNAME as approvalUsername --결재 요청자명 ,ir.APPROVAL_DEPTNAME as approvalDeptname --결재 요청자 부서명 ,ir.APPROVAL_JOBTITLE as approvalJobtitle --결재 요청자 직위 ,ir.APPROVAL_PROCESSDATE as approvalProcessdate--결재 요청 일자 ,ir.APPROVER_PROCESSDATE as approverProcessdate--결재승인일자 ,ir.TITLE as title --결재 제목 ,ir.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate --승인일자 ,mm.WBS_CD as wbsCd ,mm.TSS_SCN_CD as tssScnCd --과제구분코드 ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('TSS_SCN_CD',mm.TSS_SCN_CD) tssScnNm ,mm.PGS_STEP_CD as pgsStepCd --진행단계코드 ,dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('PGS_STEP_CD',mm.PGS_STEP_CD) pgsStepNm ,mm.TSS_NOS_ST as tssNosSt --과제차수상태 ,mm.TSS_NM as tssNm --과제명 ,ir.itg_rdcs_id as itgRdcsId --결재번호 from IRIS_COM_ITG_RDCS ir inner join IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST mm on ir.AFFR_CD = mm.TSS_CD inner join IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST a ON mm.PRJ_CD = A.PRJ_CD where substring(ir.GUID,1,1) in ('T', 'H') and APPROVAL_USERNAME <>'관리자' and APRDOCSTATE <> ''
AND 1 = 1
AND (a.PL_EMP_NO = #{_userSabun} OR mm.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun} OR mm.TSS_CD IN (SELECT X.TSS_CD FROM IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR X WHERE X.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun}))
AND mm.BIZ_DPT_CD IN
#{item}
AND mm.TSS_SCN_CD = '${tssScnCd}'
AND mm.TSS_NM like '%${tssNm}%'
AND ir.APPROVAL_USERNAME like '%${approvalUsername}%'
AND ir.APRDOCSTATE = #{aprdocstate}
--AND ir.APPROVAL_PROCESSDATE = '${approvalProcessdate}'
AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), ir.APPROVAL_PROCESSDATE, 112) = REPLACE('${approvalProcessdate}','-','')
AND mm.WBS_CD = #{wbsCd}
order by ir.APPROVAL_PROCESSDATE desc
